name: Fly to 3020
description:
Fly-To-3020 is a game developed by for the 3020 jam, this is my first casual game.
Your goal is to fly the hot air balloon for 3020 meters avoiding to fall into the water.

Feel free to try it and to write a comment about.

Special thanks to Chiara, my best beta tester, Sharped for the tips and to the "Sviluppare giochi" community on Discord that tried it.

* = * =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* = * =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =

Developed with Unity by Andrea "SomaOS" Somaini

UI, Music and Sounds: bought on humblebundle

Other credits:
Hot air balloon - www.vecteezy.com
Background - sanctumpixel
Wind sound - www.zapsplat.com
